title: Someone HACKED my  account
body:
Hi Riot Games!
I'm writing to you because during one of my matches (jax toplane), I've been dropped on the grounds that someone is logged in from another computer. Then I tried to log in but did not allow me to log in by mistaken password. I asked for a new password I did not get.
My account name is procsacsi
Server: EUNE
My e-mail: fige.kristof2003@gmail.com
Thank you for your answers, help and the new password (if the right solution).

procsacsi
(im writing to my friends account)

replies.body: Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap! They'll be able to verify you as the account creator and help you get it secured again. While they're at it, they should be able to help reverse any damage that might have been done in the process!
Send an ticket to roit support
